page.title: 15LARTINGTON HALL;COUNTRY FAIR
page.content:
disrepair. In 1957 Norman died and for the next 15 years olive lived there suffering from artheritis whilst the building fell down. Lartington Hall is now owned by Robin Rackam and is a country club. { {______________________________________
{ TEESDALE COUNTRY FAIR {_____________________
For the past 11 years there has been a country fair at Lartington. The aims of the country fair are a) To display and demonstrate the arts, crafts and activities of country life particularly in Teesdale. b) To prvide competitions and entertainment for townsmen and countrymen alike. c) After providing expenses and remunerations for staging the fair, to
